subject: AI & Agents
title: Keyword Search with BM25
description: Learn Keyword Search with BM25 in one minute.

hook.text: Search 'python web framework' and get results containing those exact words. That's BM25.

buildup.text: BM25 scores documents by term frequency, inverse document frequency, and document length.

discovery.text: It's the default algorithm behind Elasticsearch, Solr, and most traditional search engines.

twist.text: BM25 misses synonyms: search 'car' and miss documents that only say 'automobile.'

climax.text: Hybrid search combines BM25 (precision) with vector search (recall) for best results.

punchline.text: Fast, interpretable, and still hard to beat for exact matches.
